verses.verse: And the land of Judah will be a terror to Egypt; everyone who makes mention of it will be afraid in himself, because of the counsel of the LORD of hosts which He has (Is. 14:24; Dan. 4:35) determined against it.

Egypt, Assyria, and Israel Blessed In that day five cities in the land of Egypt will (Zeph. 3:9) speak the language of Canaan and (Is. 45:23) swear by the LORD of hosts; one will be called the City of Destruction.
In that day (Gen. 28:18; Ex. 24:4; Josh. 22:10, 26, 27; Is. 56:7; 60:7) there will be an altar to the LORD in the midst of the land of Egypt, and a pillar to the (Ps. 68:31) LORD at its border.

And (Josh. 4:20; 22:27) it will be for a sign and for a witness to the LORD of hosts in the land of Egypt; for they will cry to the LORD because of the oppressors, and He will send them a (Is. 43:11) Savior and a Mighty One, and He will deliver them.

Then the LORD will be known to Egypt, and the Egyptians will ((Is. 2:3, 4; 11:9)) know the LORD in that day, and (Is. 56:7; 60:7; Zech. 14:16-18; Mal. 1:11) will make sacrifice and offering; yes, they will make a vow to the LORD and perform it.
And the LORD will strike Egypt, He will strike and (Deut. 32:39; Is. 30:26; 57:18; (Heb. 12:11)) heal it; they will return to the LORD, and He will be entreated by them and heal them.
